data.text: @MichaelBennet Colorado voting is the gold standard for corruption and fraud

@MichaelBennet ....you know nothing about secure elections, to say nothing of any made up alleged gold standard.  There is no such thing in the U.S., anywhere,especially after YOU left our borders wide open for years and millions of illegals are NOW on our voting rolls...YOU DID THAT, you POS

@MichaelBennet CO elections are far from the gold standard and you know it. Mail out ballot's have no chain of custody.  None of the electronic counting machines are even certifiable, because parts are made in China...against the law not to mention they are easily rigged, as proved in court..
@MichaelBennet You are a dishonest POS who sound like a drunk homeless girl.
@MichaelBennet The gold standard?  Voter id isn't required idiot, nothing gold about that
@MichaelBennet Gold standard for corruption and disenfranchisement
@MichaelBennet We don’t want you as governor!
